attributes.action: How embarrassing for the poor old gal!  NOW WILL YOU PLEASE FIND AN AMERICAN TO DO THE JOB!
attributes.additional_details: There is NOBODY in these islands who can escape the tendrils of corruptedness infecting party political activity in this country these days.  Only a person protected by the Bill of Rights or Constitution of his own country - like an American citizen - can be trusted by the citizens of this country to be able to withstand the HUGE pressures (mainly illegal and dishonest) which will be placed upon him by those people in high positions of our professional and political elite groups which are those being investigated by this inquiry.  We have need of an `Untouchable` to properly conduct this investigation.
